title: Letterpress course offering
content: I will once again be offering Finer Points in Letterpress Typography through Art Center College of Design
author: bieler

comments.content:
I'm taking this class now, and there are so many good reasons   
to sign up, I can't begin. Whether you're interested in theory   
or practice, Gerald is your man - he manages to both instill a   
respect for letterpress (sans the cloying nostalgia) as well as   
give all the insight needed in those 14 wonderful weeks, with   
no preaching whatsoever. A surprising proportion of the class   
is devoted to "self-study" - especially suitable to those who   
already have some typographic attitudes in place.   
  
And if you're not in Southern California, consider moving.   
As we say: the weather is here, wish you were beautiful. ;-)   
  
hhp
